trends: There has been one other sighting in Gilboa
There were no other sightings in Gilboa on or around November 24th 0001
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend witnessed what seemed to be a meteor flying accross the sky fairly low. Thing that got me the most and which made it unique was a couple of things 1- the emmence speed 2- the very low altitude 3- was bee lining straight across the sky but at an abnormal hieght for it to be so straight 4- what it did at the very end, flying erratically and then the upward swooping motion it made before disappearing. Was extremely bright orange and red. See alot of shooting stars up hear but never so orange before and so low.
